data.title: Marie Jacques Maillot (1726-1814)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Marie Jacques Maillot born 1726 Grondines, Canada, Nouvelle-France died 1814 St-Eustache, Bas-Canada including ancestors + descendants + 1 genealogist comments + DNA connections + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Ancestors Descendants

Profile last modified 27 Sep 2022 | Created 6 Jan 2013

This page has been accessed 446 times.

Contents

1 Biography

2 Note

3 Sources

4 Acknowledgements

Biography

Marie Maillot ... also known as Marie Jacques Maillot, she dies in 1814 in St-Eustache, no age stated on the record. Her husband was already deceased. There is a Nicolas Provost present at the funeral, relationship not stated. [1][2]

Note

Alternate marriage date of 14 Mar 1748, Batiscan, Canada, Nouvelle-France. PRDH gives a date of 1749 Lieu indéterminé (au Québec).

Do you have information about Maillot? Please contribute to her biography. Everything on WikiTree is a collaborative work-in-progress.

Marie Maillot was born 6 Apr 1726. [3]

Marie Jacque Mailhot. [4] Therese Maillot. [5] Louise Thérèse Maillot. Found multiple versions of name. Using Marie Jacque Mailhot.

Born 1725 La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. 6 Apr 1726. La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. 12 Mar 1724. Portneuf, , Quebec, Canada. 1725 St Laurent, Quebec, Canada. Found multiple copies of birth date. Using 1725

Died 1785 La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. 26 Jul 1769. La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. 26 Jul 1769. La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. 4 Dec 1767. La Pérade, Quebec, Canada. Found multiple copies of death date. Using 1785

Baptism: 7 Avril 1726. Grondines[6][7]

File Format: jpg. Mariage de Joseph Prévost ( Provost ) et Marie Maillot ( Jacques ). Format: jpg. Joseph Prévost ( Provost ) et Marie Maillot page 1. Format: jpg. Joseph Prévost ( Provost ) et Marie Maillot page 2. Format: jpg. Mariage de Joseph Prévost et Marie Jacques Maillot 14 Feb. 1749. Format: jpg. Joseph Prévost et Marie Maillot page 3.

Marriage Husband @P413@. Wife @P412@. Child: Marie Jacque Mailhot. Marriage 08 Jan 1713. Deschaillons, , Quebec, Canada. [8][9][10]
